Room.Name: Sapphire Room
Room.LongDescription: The walls are covered with sapphires, which cast an eerie blue light. There is a single chair in the room, which hovers slightly off the floor. Seated there is a wizard wearing a red robe with a blue collar. He has a tiny, glittering key to the training room in his hand. He does not speak, but points to the glittering key with his other hand.
